about_the_game:
Expand your Steel Division 2 experience for free with the new Valley of Death map. This Skirmish map is playable in every game mode, including solo, coop, and multiplayer.

The Valley of Death in Steel Division 2 intricately linked with the Slovak National Uprising in the autumn of 1944. A once pleasant valley on the Polish-Slovak border saw ferocious fighting as Allied Soviet troops repeatedly clashed with Axis forces.

The real-life terrain height variations are faithfully represented, with a river splitting the main battlefield. The plain follows the river’s path, creating enough space in its center for a village, while very large forests on small hills define the other side of the combat zone. The four hills in this sector are on high plateaus, separated by a geological rift.

Reinforcement Pack 15 - Valley of Death is free to all owners of Steel Division 2.
